Posts.Content: I hope your post is removed - not because you wrote it, but because you seem to have chosen the role of a martyr - and, an unhappy one at that.  Why either of you would have stayed together is beyond imagination. It is one thing to have misery in life, but choosing misery - for either of you, is beyond comprehension.  Good therapy for both of you - separately, seems in order.  Or, just leave.  It couldn't get worse from what you describe.
Posts.Title: Divorce and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: This sounds worse than a dx of breast cancer.  Why you think you are doing anyone any favors is not rational.
Posts.Title: Divorce and Breast Cancer
